overview:
•Experienced and well rounded, digital media, sales and marketing professional with a demonstrated expertise surrounding online marketing, media buying, business development, sales, negotiations, team-building and multi-million dollar budget administration. Extensive e-marketing experience surrounding online branding, customer acquisition, activation and retention strategies with an overall track record of meeting and exceeding challenging business goals.

Specialties • Team building, business development, sales, and digital marketing • Business unit P&L and multi-million dollar marketing budget management experience • Integrated sales & marketing expertise in multiple disciplines: interactive, direct marketing, traditional advertising, CRM, loyalty, sales promotion and public relations • Proven success leveraging business partnerships and multi-party strategic alliances to achieve broad business objectives
